title: Value of consumer credit outstanding in the U.S. 2000 to 2018
yAxis: Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 19.
Overall Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars, of value 3918.3 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars, of value 1716.97 was reported at Year 2000
